metadata.synopsis: A Bhaal Cultist in the Temple of Bhaal.

0.speaker: Bhaal Cultist Bloodmopper
0.text: To let such a weakling leave unharmed... But it is Bhaal's decree. I will not defy him.
0.context: NodeContext: Struggling not to murder you there and then, findhing resolve in obeying his god's commands

1.speaker: Bhaal Cultist Bloodmopper
1.text: Sarevok... Purged at last. I do not see why the Dread Lord kept such a fossil around so long.
1.context: NodeContext: Thinks Sarevok was a fool

2.speaker: Bhaal Cultist Bloodmopper
2.text: Orin has taught us much in your absence. I can't wait for you to see...
2.context: NodeContext: Warning, trying to make you jealous

3.speaker: Bhaal Cultist Bloodmopper
3.text: Come no closer. You live and breathe here by Bhaal's will, not mine.

4.speaker: Bhaal Cultist Bloodmopper
4.text: The stone trembles at your presence. Bhaal is watching. So is Orin. We are waiting.

5.speaker: Bhaal Cultist Bloodmopper
5.text: A brutal death - Orin deserved nothing less. May we all be so lucky.
5.context: NodeContext: Approving without being impressed. This is just how it should be.

6.speaker: Bhaal Cultist Bloodmopper
6.text: Only fools have ever lingered in my presence. Dead fools. Go.
6.context: NodeContext: Threatening (toying with you - this doesn't lead to combat)
